name: Eagle-Eye Goggles
desc: During your attack, gain Advantage on the entire Attack action.

name: Iron Helmet
desc: When attacked, consider any ^modifier_2x_circle^ attack modifier card the enemy draws to be a ^modifier_zero_circle^ instead.

name: Chain Armor
desc: During your turn gain Shield ^shield^ 1 for the rest of the round

name: Studded Leather
desc: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain Shield ^shield^ 1 for the attack.

name: Weathered Boots
desc: During your movement add +1 Move ^move^ to a single movement.

name: Winged Shoes
desc: During your movement, add Jump ^jump^ to the entire Move Action.
faq: Winged Shoes may be used for only a single movement ability, not for multiple movement abilities of an action (ex: Action with Move, Attack, Move).

name: Heater Shield
desc: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield ^shield^ 1 for the attack.

name: Throwing Hammer
desc: During your ranged attack, add STUN $stun$ to a single attack

name: Poison Dagger
desc: During your melee attack, add POISON $poison$ to a single attack.

name: Iron Spear
desc: During your single-target melee Attack ability, attack any one enemy wihin 2 hexes

name: Healing Potion
desc: During your turn, perform a "Heal ^heal^ 3, Self" action.

name: Stamina Potion
desc: During your turn, return one of your discarded cards to your hand.

name: Power Potion
desc: During your attack, add +1 Attack ^attack^ to your entire Attack action.

name: Mana Potion
desc: During your turn, infuse any one element. @any@

name: Amulet of Life
desc: During your turn, "Heal ^heal^ 1, Self" action.

name: Robes of Evocation
desc: During your attack, @x-any@ to add +1 Attack ^attack^ to the entire Attack action.

name: Comfortable Shoes
desc: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card, perform a "Move ^move^ 3" action instead of a "Move ^move^ 2" action.

name: Battle-Axe
desc: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following: *cone_0_1*

name: Black Candle
desc: During your ranged attack, add CURSE $curse$ to a single attack.

name: Stun Powder
desc: During your attack, add STUN $stun$ to a single attack.

name: Hawk Helm
desc: During your ranged attack, add +1 Range ^range^ to your entire Attack action.

name: Bladed Armor
desc: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield ^shield^ 2 for the attack and the attacker suffers 2 damage.

name: Boots of Striding
desc: During your movement, add +2 Move ^move^ to a single movement.

name: Volatile Bomb
desc: During your single-target ranged attack action, turn the attack into the following: *cone_1_1*

name: Barbed Chain
desc: During your ranged attack, add PULL $pull$ 2 to a single attack.

name: Oak Charm
desc: During your turn, perform a "BLESS $bless$, Range ^range^ 5" action.

name: Fateful Compass
desc: During your turn, force one enemy within Range ^range^ 3 to perform a "Move ^move^ 2" action with you controlling the action.

name: Flea-Bitten Shawl
source:
Reward from Scenario #8
Reward from Scenario #12
desc: You are considered to have an initiative of 99 for the purpose of enemy focusing.
faq: The item does not actually change a character's initiative so it doesn't affect their summons' initiative. It only changes how monster's treat the character during focus evaluation.

name: Tower Shield
desc: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield ^shield^ 2 for the attack.

name: Ring of Haste
desc: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the bottom action of that card.

name: Ring of Strength
desc: During your turn, gain STRENGTHEN $strengthen$.

name: Ring of Restoration
desc: During your turn, perform a "Heal ^heal^ 3, Range ^range^ 5" action.

name: Steel Ring
desc: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield ^shield^ 4 for the attack.

name: Barbed Axe
desc: During your attack, add WOUND $wound$ to the entire Attack Action.

name: Robes of Command
desc: During your turn, one adjacent ally may perform and "Attack ^attack^ 2" Action.

name: Jet Boots
desc: During your movement, add +1 Move ^move^ and Jump ^jump^ to a single movement.
